page.title: 11FARM COMPUTERS
page.content: For years farmers have been able to run farms without the help of computers,getting most of it right and keeping pests down. Now farms are using computers to work out when to spray, which spray to use and when the crop needs it most. Each farmer gets a card per field on which he enters specified information which is fed into a computer and the computer produces a read out. This read out states the number of hectares in the field, the crop, the soil type, the quality, a soil analysis, fertiliser analysis, then the spraying information and the average result for crops.
